entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
